perturbation.original_text: This agreement shall automatically renew for a period of three (3) years and upon the parties mutual agreement on new minimum performance goals for the renewal period.
perturbation.changed_text: This agreement shall automatically renew for an indefinite period, irrespective of any agreement on new minimum performance goals.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement auto-renews for three years contingent on mutual agreement regarding new minimum performance goals. The modified text eliminates the need for mutual agreement and makes the renewal indefinite, directly contradicting the original requirement.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor shall promptly inform Erchonia of any suggested modifications or improvements to the Products and shall, upon Erchonia’s request and at Erchonia’s expense, execute any documents necessary or appropriate to assign or confirm that all intellectual property rights in any modification or improvement related to the Products are fully vested in Erchonia.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor shall not be required to inform Erchonia of any suggested modifications or improvements to the Products. All intellectual property rights in any modification or improvement related to the Products shall be fully vested in the Distributor, irrespective of any request or expense by Erchonia.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates that the distributor inform Erchonia of improvements and assign IP rights to Erchonia. The modified text removes the obligation to inform, and assigns all IP rights for modifications to the distributor, contradicting the original allocation of intellectual property rights.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor may not assign to any person any duties or obligations arising under this Agreement without Erchonia’s prior written consent (which consent may be withheld in Erchonia’s sole discretion).
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor may freely assign all duties or obligations arising under this Agreement to any person, without the need for Erchonia’s consent.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires Erchonia's written consent for the Distributor to assign duties/obligations. The modified text allows the Distributor to freely assign such duties without any consent, thus directly contradicting the restriction in the original agreement.
